title: Russian sovereign fund announces 10 deals in UAE worth more than $1.3 billion
text:
Russian sovereign fund announces 10 deals in UAE worth more than $1.3 billion

Stock Markets 5 minutes ago (Oct 15, 2019 04:06AM ET)

© Reuters. Russian sovereign fund announces 10 deals in UAE worth more than $1.3 billion RIYADH (Reuters) - Russia's RDIF sovereign wealth fund said it would sign 10 investment agreements worth more than $1.3 billion with partners from the United Arab Emirates including the Mubadala Investment Company on Tuesday. The agreements, to be signed during a visit by Russian President Vladimir Putin, will cover high tech, health care, mineral resources extraction, logistics and industrial manufacture, RDIF said in a statement.

Russian sovereign fund announces 10 deals in UAE worth more than $1.3 billion
